description: This shelf writhes around the mountain for a short distance to the east.  A large outcropping of pink granite juts out from the slope above, creating a canopy overhead that has kept the shelf mostly snow-free.  The outcropping does nothing to weaken the bitter winds, however.  Strewn over the ground are tufts of fur and gnawed bones, their presence marking this shelf as some creature's lair.
title: [Southern Slopes, Narrow Shelf]
